Header: Alcohol worth Rs. 1.5 Mn seized in Thalpe
Content: Colombo (News1st): The Southern Province Excise Special Operations Division raided a hotel in Thalpe, Babaraduwa. They were able to discover a large haul of local and international liquor hidden in storage. Authorities said the value of the seized alcohol is around Rs. 1.5 Million. Investigations are underway.
